description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying a meter type record.
Business code for the meter type used to label and reference a measurement across the system; must be unique.
Human-readable explanation of what the meter type measures and how it’s expressed.
Optional free-text notes or context about the meter type (usage, calibration, constraints).
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this record from any source.
Timestamp of the latest change performed by a user; field name is ambiguous and likely misnamed—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or service that created this record; confirm identifier format with SME.
Timestamp when this record was initially created by a user or service.
Identifier of the user or service that most recently modified this record.
Timestamp when a user or service last modified this record.
